title: Shin Koihime Musou - Otome Ryouran Sangokushi Engi
original_name: 真恋姫無双 乙女繚乱 ☆ 三国志演義
sinopse: Kazuto Hongo finds himself in a chaotic world where beautiful girl warlords compete for dominance! He starts to set the world aright, joining Liu Bei’s party as heaven’s angel—but what is his destiny? (Source: Jmanga)
